text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright
Laughter fills the night
Music free and wild
We dance in the yard

[Verse 2]
Feet on summer grass
Time it moves so fast
Catch the rhythm’s spark
We dance in the yard

[Chorus]
Dance dance
Underneath the moonlight
Dance dance
Holding on so tight
Dance dance
Till the morning light
We dance in the yard

[Bridge]
Neighbors start to join
Voices soft and warm
Hearts feeling alive
We dance in the yard

[Verse 3]
Joy is in the air
Free without a care
With my bestest friends
We dance in the yard

[Chorus]
Dance dance
Underneath the moonlight
Dance dance
Holding on so tight
Dance dance
Till the morning light
We dance in the yard
title: Dancing in the Yard
